message: I'm offering you a high-quality product for $100. It's a rare opportunity to get a premium item at a fixed price. If you're interested, I'll send it your way. If not, I'll let you know it's not available and we can move on to the next round.

I'm offering you a product for $100. To be honest, I'm not sure if it's a good deal or not. I've had some mixed feedback about this one. If you're feeling adventurous, you can take a chance and see what you think. If not, I can pass on to the next round.
